author: Football Spy
title: Man City's Pablo Zabaleta wanted by Premier League side? Transfer news and gossip from Sunday's papers
text:
Man City's Pablo Zabaleta wanted by Premier League side? Transfer news and gossip from Sunday's papers PLUS: Chelsea have been told to pay Â£30million to sign Ben Gibson from Middlesbrough Share Pablo Zabaleta could be on his way out of Man City (Photo: Clive Mason) Share Get football updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
West Ham are keen on a move for Manchester City defender Pablo Zabaleta, according to the Mail on Sunday. 
The Argentine full-back will consider his future this summer and could be open to leaving the Etihad, particularly if Pep Guardiola does not give him assurances over playing time. 
West Ham believe they could tempt Zabaleta to London and would be able to sign him on a free as his contract will be up at the end of June. 
But what other transfer rumours are there in Sunday's papers? Below are the best lines from around the British press... The top transfer stories from the Sunday Mirror and Sunday People Sanchez is becoming an outcast (Photo: Rex Features)
